A "Hike and Learn" program that pairs experienced hikers with educational resources the trail to teach younger hikers about the flora, fauna, and history of the region.
A "Hike and Cook" program that teaches hikers how to prepare meals on the trail using only ingredients and equipment that can be carried.
A "Hike and Relax" program that incorporates meditation, yoga, and other relaxation techniques into the hiking experience to promote mental and physical wellness.
A "Hike and Explore" program that takes hikers off the beaten path and into lesser-known areas of the trail, including hidden waterfalls, wildlife habitats, and scenic overlooks.
A "Hike and Connect" program that encourages hikers to engage with the local communities along the trail, learning about the culture, history, and traditions of the region.
